title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 07/16/2022 INC#0592

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0592; 10:32AM; NB 101 Fwy x Hollywood Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oaFP3O; #Hollywood; LAFD Firefighters skillfully freed two seriously injured adult occupants from their overturned sedan, which came to rest overturned on the northbound Hollywood Boulevard onramp, after striking two light poles. Both patients (unknown age/ gender / medical condition / affiliation / circumstances) have been transported to a regional trauma center. #LATraffic: Closure of at least two lanes of the northbound Hollywood (US101) Freeway near Hollywood Boulevard, as well as the northbound US101 onramp at Hollywood Boulevard until CHP operations are complete. Motorists should anticipate congestion and delay in the area, and monitor traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries: CHP Central L.A. (Log #1097); FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E27 E35 E52 E6 E76 EM11 HR3 RA35 RA52 RA6 T27 T35 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0592; 10:10AM; NB 101 Fwy x Sunset Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oaFP3O; #Hollywood; PRELIM: Solo vehicle overturned, with two persons trapped.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E235 E35 E52 E6 E76 EM11 HR3 RA35 RA52 T35 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0220; 03:19AM; 15421 W Plummer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3c8ib5i; #NorthHills; PRELIM: 34 Firefighters took 39 minutes (3:58 AM) to access, confine and fully extinguish an outside fire that extended to a 50' x 100' one-story corrugated metal automotive repair shop (undetermined business name). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E275 E287 E290 E7 E90 RA75 RA87 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1569; 07:36PM; 138 W Av 27; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ceZNrA; #LincolnHeights; 24 LAFD Firefighters took just 23 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames within a detached one story home at the rear of the property. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E1 E201 E202 E44 RA12 T1 T2; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1569; 07:17PM; 138 W Av 27; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ceZNrA; #LincolnHeights; PRELIM: Heavy smoke from a one story home at the rear of the property.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E1 E201 E202 E44 RA12 T1 T2; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#1342; 05:20PM; Topanga State Park; MAP: https://bit.ly/3z6qEPv; Santa Monica Mountains; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response in Automatic Aid to the Los Angeles County Fire Department (LACoFD) for one injured hiker in remote terrain within their jurisdiction. The hovering LAFD helicopter will hoist the hiker (unknown age / gender / condition / affiliation / circumstances) aboard for continuing care in direct transport to an area hospital.; BC9 BP23 E23 E269 E293 H2 H6 HA2 HA6 RA23 RH114 T69 T93 + LACoFD; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Forward Progress Stopped - Brush Fire 07/15/2022 INC#1046

item.description: Forward Progress Stopped - Brush Fire; INC#1046; 03:20PM; 12261 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cjfyOi; #LakeViewTerrace; Despite flames fanned by 10 mph winds from the east, LAFD and LACoFD ground crews have stopped forward progress of the fire in just 33 minutes, confining flames to little more than one-half (0.5) acre of light grass alongside the EB Foothill (I-210) Freeway east of the Ronald Reagan (SR-118) Freeway. Though one business was briefly threatened by the flames, there has been no structural involvement. No injuries, and no evacuation. Firefighters will remain at scene this afternoon for further contain and control the blaze, the cause of which remains under investigation.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 E102 E24 E260 E274 E290 E298 E39 E60 E7 E89 EM14 H4 H5 H6 HA4 HA5 HA6 RA7 T60 T74 T90 T98 WT88 + LACoFD; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1046; 02:47PM; 12261 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cjfyOi; #LakeViewTerrace; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with LACoFD in Automatic Aid to one-half (0.5) acre of light grass burning alongside the EB Foothill (I-210) Freeway east of the Ronald Reagan (SR-118) Freeway, fanned by ~ 10 mph wind from the east, threatening at least one business on adjacent Foothill Boulevard. No evacuation. ; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E102 E24 E260 E274 E290 E298 E39 E89 EM14 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA7 T60 T74 T90 T98 + LACoFD; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

Vehicle vs Pedestrian; INC#1139; 04:22PM; 1001 N Broadway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3c6NuNX; #ElysianPark; One vehicle collided with a bus stop, resulting in two injured - one fatality and one patient transported to a local trauma center in critical condition. LAPD Inc #3139. Nothing further.; FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E1 E201 E203 E4 EM11 HR3 RA17 RA56 T1 T3 T9; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic; INC#0837; 01:02PM; 13361 W Paxton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IEm4LK; Pacoima; Firefighters/paramedics on scene of a two-vehicle traffic collision, assessing/treating (and preparing to transport) 3 patients (conditions: 2 serious, 1 fair). LAPD Inc #2262. Nothing further.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E298 E75 E91 EM15 RA18 RA75 RA903 RA91 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
